name: Glow Hockey HD Pro
description:
New style of the classic arcade hockey game - Glow Air Hockey.
New experience of playing hockey game. Challenge yourself with the computer opponents or with your friends!
Features:
- Colorful glow visuals
- Simple to play, fun for all ages
- Smooth and responsive gameplay
- Realistic physics, sound effects
- Two modes: single player & two players
- 3 difficulty levels: easy, medium, hard

How to play:
- Control your puck with your finger
- Try to get the puck into your opponent's goal
- You score if the puck appears on your opponent's side of the ball
